response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs. Given its value and quality, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, aiming to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a swift transaction. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 14000}
